description: I'm Dominik Jalowinski. Painter and cryptoartist from Poland. In crypto since 2017. Blending physical and virtual, mixing analog with digital. You can buy my original oil paintings as well as their digital versions in here. Check my cryptovoxels parcel on https://www.cryptovoxels.com/play?coords=N@423W,270N or more of my paintings at https://www.instagram.com/dj_alowinski/
